comics.title: Saga
comics.summary: A sweeping space opera following the intergalactic adventures of a young family on the run.
comics.awards: Hugo Award for Best Graphic Story

comics.title: Batman: The Court of Owls
comics.summary: Batman discovers a secret society in Gotham City that has been controlling it from the shadows.
comics.awards: Eisner Award for Best New Series

comics.title: The Walking Dead
comics.summary: A post-apocalyptic tale following a group of survivors trying to stay alive in a world overrun by zombies.
comics.awards: Eisner Award for Best Continuing Series

comics.title: Y: The Last Man
comics.summary: The story of Yorick Brown, the last surviving male human on Earth after a mysterious plague wipes out all other males.
comics.awards: Eisner Award for Best Continuing Series

comics.title: Watchmen
comics.summary: A dark and complex deconstruction of superhero tropes set in an alternate version of the United States.
comics.awards: Hugo Award for Best Graphic Story

comics.title: Sandman
comics.summary: The story of Morpheus, the Lord of Dreams, and his interactions with various supernatural beings.
comics.awards: Hugo Award for Best Graphic Story

comics.title: Ms. Marvel (2014)
comics.summary: Kamala Khan, a Pakistani-American teenager, discovers her superhuman abilities and takes on the mantle of Ms. Marvel.
comics.awards: Eisner Award for Best New Series

comics.title: The Umbrella Academy
comics.summary: A dysfunctional family of superpowered individuals reunites to investigate their father's mysterious death.
comics.awards: Eisner Award for Best Finite Series

comics.title: Astro City
comics.summary: An anthology series that explores the lives of both ordinary people and superheroes in the fictional city of Astro City.
comics.awards: Eisner Award for Best Continuing Series

comics.title: Fables
comics.summary: Characters from fairy tales and folklore are forced to live in modern-day New York City after being exiled from their Homelands.
comics.awards: Eisner Award for Best New Series
